response.overview: The central character of the film is Tu Le - CEO of AFC bank. His business has good performance without corruption.  However, he still could not resist the higher forces that govern him. Actually, Tu Le is also just a pawn. There are thousands of billions spent by AFC bank to save real estate businesses on the orders of his superiors.  Tu Le understands that such high prices can lead to very serious consequences, but he does not know what to do but...resign then get away and push the burden to his successor.
response.title: Heaven's Net
